GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1215326 |website = |footnotes = |pop_est_as_of = |pop_est_footnotes = |population_est = |area_total_km2 = 8.88 |area_land_km2 = 8.88 |area_water_km2 = 0.00 }} Old Forge is a borough in Lackawanna County, Pennsylvania, United States. The population was 8,497 at the 2020 census. It is located about 3.5 miles from Scranton and 13 miles from Wilkes-Barre. ==References== Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania
